message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is that something we can work with?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the $9500 price point. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $11000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm still looking to save some money. How about $9800?
I understand you're trying to save some money, Bob. However, I still need to make a decent profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9800 and $11000. How about $10400?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Alice. I'll offer $9500 again, but I'm willing to consider a slightly higher price. Can we meet at $9700?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet at $9700. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $10200?
Alice, I'm really interested in this product, but I'm getting close to my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for it. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10500. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
